Smart Pencil: Incorporate a small sensor or microchip into the pencil to track writing speed, pressure, and angle. This data can be used to provide feedback on writing technique or to automatically adjust the writing experience.
Eco-Friendly Pencil: Create a pencil made from sustainable materials, such as recycled paper or biodegradable plastic.
Multi-Functional Pencil: Design a pencil with multiple functions, such as a built-in eraser, sharpener, or even a small flashlight.
Pencil with Augmented Reality: Incorporate an AR headset or display into the pencil to provide a more immersive writing experience.
Pencil with Voice Recognition: Add voice recognition technology to the pencil to allow users to dictate their writing.
